Reviews.Title: Great Life Cam
Reviews.Author: P. Kuo "Pretty Cool"
Reviews.Content: I am not really into the live-streaming deal, but I was looking for a wearable camera like the go-pro, and this camera fit the description perfectly. There are lots of different accessories (for bike handles, helmets, etc) packed into this one, I only wished that it had come with an underwater housing as well.There's also an accompanying Looxcie app for your phone/tablet too. My guess is that it works along with the camera for the live broadcasts but I didn't want to set up another account. But you dont' have to sign up to see some of the videos other are sharing. It's a lot of short quick clips, mostly (all?) unedited. It's actually kind of a charming alternative to youtube.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use
Reviews.Author: cintikath
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I'm not very tech savvy and have had no trouble using it. It couldn't be easier. It's great quality and the accessories make it amazingly simple.

Reviews.Title: FREAKIN AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Cort
Reviews.Content: This is a gorgeous camera and very light weight. Love how easy this was to setup and you can feel the true quality in the feel of the product. I use this everyday to shoot coffee videos and love it. But most importantly the audio is too notch. Keep making great products guys!

Reviews.Title: Versatile and has extras
Reviews.Author: oknutson
Reviews.Content: I have used them in training environments for a few years using the LX1 and now I have the Explorer HD. Both are great and the pay off for the slightly larger HD model is the on-board WIFI. Connects to phones and PCs as well as group POV Point Of View. HD quality is nice bonus over the LX1 too. [...]

Reviews.Title: Nice video and easier than I thought
Reviews.Author: Holly C. Oswald
Reviews.Content: Nice small, compact video camera - great for filming my hunt.  Able to upload easily to my laptop. I am not very tech savvy and was able to figure this out.

Reviews.Title: Needs Work
Reviews.Author: Inventor "InventorNC"
Reviews.Content: This HD Looxie needs work.  LOTS of work.  The user manual is a study in gettng users completely irritated by not answering questions and handing the user off to other places for answers instead of providing the answers on the spot.We have gotten on board much more complicated devices than this with a tenth of the effort in way less time..The packaging is overly complicated and totally non intuitive.Too bad because the concept is OK and the construction almost makes it.  Now if we can  figure out how to reset the resolution.  LOL

Reviews.Title: great to have around
Reviews.Author: czonline
Reviews.Content: this will be a great help making a video. freeing up my hand to keep control of my wheelchair THANKS

Reviews.Title: Ready for some fun?
Reviews.Author: rich washington
Reviews.Content: The video quality is amazingly good and it's multi functionality is convenient, lightweight and durable.It is more fun and more in your face type of digital camera.Have agreat day.

Reviews.Title: Above my expectations
Reviews.Author: blondiefrommd
Reviews.Content: The Looxie is a small little camera/ recorder but its not small on quality at all. My husbands uses this for when he is out riding his GSXR or out rock climbing and he absolutely loves it. The quality is superb above my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, very light weight, takes great video, would recommend to anyone looking to buy a versatile video camera

Reviews.Title: Doesn't meet the expected results.
Reviews.Author: Gene D.
Reviews.Content: The camera will not work with an iPAD but not stated in the sales description.  The website you have to work with is hard to use and is not simple.  Technical support and instructions are poor.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Camera!
Reviews.Author: Susan Smoaks
Reviews.Content: It's small, easy to use and it works fantastic.  I love this camera.  I don't have any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: nikita
Reviews.Content: Seems very well made and convenient...could definitely use this ! Gonna try it thank you and good luck in the future!

Reviews.Title: State of the Art Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Shivonne
Reviews.Content: The is the most amazing little compact camera I've ever seen!  I LOVE the fact that you don't even (have to) carry it! It's soo incredible that this LITTLE camera has soo MANY wonderful features! The video quality is like no other!  My husband is an avid bike rider and appreciates the value of such a unique and quality camera!  Thank you, Looxcie!!

Reviews.Title: Might be small but packs a powerful punch
Reviews.Author: LovelyDreamer
Reviews.Content: Love it. Quality is superb. So easy to operate, use, have fun with. Very cool.You can use it inside, you can use it outside in good weather or bad.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Tammie Pyrzewski
Reviews.Content: Camera is tiny but quality is huge! My son is using it on a train where he is conductor, amazing little thing with amazing quality!
